page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Every weekend we go out somewhere as a family.We walk usually but occasionally we have a pub lunch & do something exciting, like going to the zoo .We get pleasure & exercise out of these outings.My dad does "Do it Yourself" because he gets a good job done how he wants it.Both my parents do some gardening ,partly for pleasure & partly to make it look nice.We watch television every day. I watch cartoons & American police programmes. My mum & dad only watch news, nature & gardening.They get hints on things & find out what is going on in the world from these.By myself I like to ride my bicycle and practice stunts on it.With my friends I go to the park & practice my football skills.
